Just to confirm:
- you have build i1213 installed
- you installed the Core tools
- the Core tools work with the build
- problems occur when you try and launch a runtime workbench either in Run or
Debug mode

Does this sound right?
Which versions of boot and runtime did you have in your workspace?

I know that there were some self-hosting issues with PDE in earlier builds.
There were cases where the wrong versions of boot and runtime were being picked up.

No more information from originator.
As well, it works for me ok in the latest builds.
Closing.
